paragraphs:
Programmer / Web Designer
Passionate and hardworking; always excited to learn new things.

Current Occupation: Student @ UCI
Major: Computer Science

BananaToken Arcade is my personal collection of HTML5 and Flash games that I've developed. The website also has a user registration and login system run behind the scenes in a MySQL database. The backend is comprised of a mix of NodeJS and PHP.
The source code for the games is available here.
